name: HERNANDO COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist Hernando County Sheriffs Office with negotiating a new per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service at the Hernando County jail.
Assist Hernando County Sheriffs Office with negotiating a new per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service at the Hernando County jail.
Assist the Hernando County Sheriff's Office in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
